00014 enum Surroundings {
00015     LEFT_WALL = 1,
00016     RIGHT_WALL = 2,
00017     FLOOR = 4,
00018     CEILING = 8,
00019     BACK_WALL = 16,
00020     FRONT_WALL = 32
00021 };
00022 
00023 template <int N>
00024 class AABB {
00025 protected:
00026     Vector<N> m_center;
00027     Vector<N> m_radius;
00028 
00029     void setRadius(Vector<N> _radius);
00030     void setCenter(Vector<N> _center);
00031 
00032 public:
00033 //C'tors
00034     AABB();
00035     AABB(const Vector<N> &center, const Vector<N> &radius);
00036     ~AABB();
00037 
00038 //Accessors
00039     const Vector<N>& center() const;
00040     const Vector<N>& radius() const;
00041     Vector<N> diameter() const;
00042     Vector<N> max() const;
00043     Vector<N> min() const;
00044     
00045     Real center(int n) const;
00046     Real radius(int n) const;
00047     Real diameter(int n) const;
00048     Real max(int n) const;
00049     Real min(int n) const;
00050 
00051 //Functions
00052     bool touching(const AABB<N> &rhs) const;
00053     bool overlaps(const AABB<N> &rhs) const;
00054     int nearbyWalls(const AABB<N> &rhs) const;
00055     void offsetCenter(const Vector<N> &offset);
00056     bool contains(const Vector<N> &point) const;
00057     Real distanceFrom(const AABB<N> &rhs) const;
00058 
00059     static bool Sweep(const AABB<N> &lhs_t0, const AABB<N> &lhs_t1,
00060                       const AABB<N> &rhs_t0, const AABB<N> &rhs_t1,
00061                       Real &r0, Real &r1);
00062     static bool Sweep(const AABB<N> &lhs, const Vector<N> &lhs_velocity,
00063                       const AABB<N> &rhs, const Vector<N> &rhs_velocity,
00064                       Real &r0, Real &r1);
00065 
00066 //Tests
00067     static void Test();
00068     static void SmokeTest();
00069     static void TestRadAndDia();
00070     static void TestOffset();

00083 typedef AABB<2> AABB2;
00084 typedef AABB<3> AABB3;
00085 
00086 template <int N>
00087 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const AABB<N> &rhs) {
00088     lhs << "AABB:" << std::endl;
00089     lhs << "  Center: " << rhs.center();
00090     lhs << "  Size:   " << rhs.radius();
00091     lhs << "  Max:    " << rhs.max();
00092     lhs << "  Min:    " << rhs.min();
00093     lhs << std::endl;
00094     
00095     return lhs;
00096 }

00101 template <int N>
00102 AABB<N>::AABB() {}
00103 
00104 template <int N>
00105 AABB<N>::AABB(const Vector<N> &center, const Vector<N> &radius)
00106 :m_center(center), m_radius(radius) {
00107     m_radius.absolute();
00108 }
00109 
00110 template <int N>
00111 AABB<N>::~AABB() {}
00112     
00113 //******************************
00114 //******* Basic Functions
00115 //******************************
00116 template <int N>
00117 void AABB<N>::offsetCenter(const Vector<N> &offset) {
00118     m_center += offset;
00119 }
00120 
00121 template <int N>
00122 int AABB<N>::nearbyWalls(const AABB<N> &rhs) const {
00123     //TODO see if it would be faster to just call "touching" and then,
00124     //if true, checking where rhs is is compared to this.
00125     Vector<N> minDist = rhs.radius() + radius();
00126     Vector<N> dist = rhs.center() - center();
00127     int wall = 0;
00128     int retVal = 0;
00129 
00130     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00131         if (Math::eq(Math::Abs(dist[i]), minDist[i])) {
00132             bool outside = false;
00133             for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
00134                 if (j == i) { continue; }
00135                 if (Math::le(max(j), rhs.min(j))) { outside = true; }
00136                 if (Math::ge(min(j), rhs.max(j))) { outside = true; }
00137             }
00138             if (!outside) {
00139                 retVal |= 1 << (dist[i] > 0 ? wall + 1 : wall);
00140             }
00141         }
00142 
00143         wall += 2;
00144     }
00145 
00146     return retVal;
00147 }
00148 
00149 template <int N>
00150 bool AABB<N>::touching(const AABB<N> &rhs) const {
00151     Vector<N> minDist = radius() + rhs.radius();
00152     Vector<N> dist = Absolute(center() - rhs.center());
00153     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00154         if (gt(dist[i], minDist[i])) { return false; }
00155     }
00156 
00157     return true;
00158 }
00159 
00160 template <int N>
00161 bool AABB<N>::overlaps(const AABB<N> &rhs) const {
00162     Vector<N> minDist = radius() + rhs.radius();
00163     Vector<N> dist = (center() - rhs.center()).getAbsolute();
00164     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00165         if (Math::ge(dist[i], minDist[i])) { return false; }
00166     }
00167 
00168     return true;
00169 }
00170 
00171 template <int N>
00172 bool AABB<N>::contains(const Vector<N> &point) const {
00173     Vector<N> dist = (center() - point);
00174     dist.absolute();
00175     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00176         if (Math::ge(dist[i], radius()[i])) { return false; }
00177     }
00178 
00179     return true;
00180 }

00186 void AABB<N>::setRadius(Vector<N> _radius) {
00187     m_radius = _radius;
00188     m_radius.absolute();
00189 }

00193     m_center = _center;

00196 template <int N>
00197 const Vector<N>& AABB<N>::center() const {
00198     return m_center;
00199 }
00200 
00201 template <int N>
00202 Real AABB<N>::center(int n) const {
00203     return m_center[n];
00204 }
00205 
00206 template <int N>
00207 const Vector<N>& AABB<N>::radius() const {
00208     return m_radius;
00209 }
00210 
00211 template <int N>
00212 Real AABB<N>::radius(int n) const {
00213     return m_radius[n];
00214 }
00215 
00216 template <int N>
00217 Vector<N> AABB<N>::diameter() const {
00218     return m_radius * 2;
00219 }
00220 
00221 template <int N>
00222 Real AABB<N>::diameter(int n) const {
00223     return m_radius[n] * 2;
00224 }
00225 
00226 template <int N>
00227 Vector<N> AABB<N>::max() const {
00228     return center() + radius();
00229 }
00230 
00231 template <int N>
00232 Real AABB<N>::max(int n) const {
00233     assert(n < N);
00234     return center()[n] + radius()[n];
00235 }
00236 
00237 template <int N>
00238 Vector<N> AABB<N>::min() const {
00239     return center() - radius();
00240 }
00241 
00242 template <int N>
00243 Real AABB<N>::min(int n) const {
00244     assert(n < N);
00245     return center()[n] - radius()[n];
00246 }
00247 
00248 template <int N>
00249 Real AABB<N>::distanceFrom(const AABB<N> &rhs) const {
00250     Vector<N> minDist = radius() + rhs.radius();
00251     Vector<N> dist = (center() - rhs.center()).getAbsolute();
00252     Vector<N> edgeDist = dist - minDist;
00253     edgeDist.clamp(0, 2e99);
00254     return edgeDist.length();
00255 }
00256 
00257 //This is a collisions test. It checks for a possible collisions and gives
00258 //the time of initial and final collisions as a ratio between 0 and 1. If
00259 //there is no collision, the values of r0 and r1 are undefined.
00260 //
00261 // @param lhs0    The initial position of one of the AABBs.
00262 // @param lhs1    The final position of one of the AABBs.
00263 // @param rhs0    The initial position of the other AABB.
00264 // @param rhs1    The final position of the other AABB.
00265 // @param r0    Upon return, this is set to the time of initial collision.
00266 // @param r1    Upon return, this is set to the time they stop colliding.
00267 //
00268 // @return     True if there is a collision, false otherwise.
00269 template <int N>
00270 bool AABB<N>::Sweep(const AABB<N> &lhs0, const AABB<N> &lhs1,
00271            const AABB<N> &rhs0, const AABB<N> &rhs1,
00272            Real &r0, Real &r1) {
00273     Vector<N> vL = lhs1.center() - lhs0.center();
00274     Vector<N> vR = rhs1.center() - rhs0.center();
00275     return Sweep(lhs0, vL, rhs0, vR, r0, r1);
00276 }
00277 
00278 
00279 //This is a collisions test. It checks for a possible collisions and gives
00280 //the time of initial and final collisions as a ratio between 0 and 1. If
00281 //there is no collision, the values of r0 and r1 are undefined.
00282 //
00283 // @param lhs    The initial position of one of the AABBs.
00284 // @param vL    The velocity of the first AABB.
00285 // @param rhs    The initial position of the other AABB.
00286 // @param vR    The velocity of the second AABB.
00287 // @param r0    Upon return, this is set to the time of initial collision.
00288 // @param r1    Upon return, this is set to the time they stop colliding.
00289 //
00290 // @return     True if there is a collision, false otherwise.
00291 template <int N>
00292 bool AABB<N>::Sweep(const AABB<N> &lhs, const Vector<N> &vL,
00293                     const AABB<N> &rhs, const Vector<N> &vR,
00294                     Real &r0, Real &r1) {
00295     Vector<N> relative = vR - vL; //Hold L still
00296     Vector<N> r0Vec, r1Vec;
00297     r1Vec.clear(1.0f);
00298 
00299     r0 = 0; r1 = 1;
00300     if (lhs.overlaps(rhs)) { return true; }
00301     if (vR == vL) { return false; }
00302     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00303         bool possible = false;
00304         if (Math::lt(relative[i], 0)) {
00305             if (Math::lt(lhs.max(i), rhs.min(i))) {
00306                 r0Vec[i] = (lhs.max(i) - rhs.min(i)) / relative[i];
00307                 possible = true;
00308             }
00309 
00310             if (Math::lt(lhs.min(i), rhs.max(i))) {
00311                 r1Vec[i] = (lhs.min(i) - rhs.max(i)) / relative[i];
00312                 possible = true;
00313             }
00314 
00315         } else if (Math::gt(relative[i], 0))  {
00316             if (Math::gt(lhs.min(i), rhs.max(i))) {
00317                 r0Vec[i] = (lhs.min(i) - rhs.max(i)) / relative[i];
00318                 possible = true;
00319             }
00320 
00321             if (Math::gt(lhs.max(i), rhs.min(i))) {
00322                 r1Vec[i] = (lhs.max(i) - rhs.min(i)) / relative[i];
00323                 possible = true;
00324             }
00325 
00326         } else {
00327             if (Math::le(lhs.max(i), rhs.min(i))) { return false; }
00328             if (Math::ge(lhs.min(i), rhs.max(i))) { return false; }
00329             possible = true;
00330         }
00331         if (!possible) {
00332             return false;
00333         }
00334     }
00335 
00336     r0 = r0Vec[0];
00337     r1 = r1Vec[0];        
00338     for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) {
00339         if (r0Vec[i] > r0) { r0 = r0Vec[i]; }
00340         if (r1Vec[i] < r1) { r1 = r1Vec[i]; }
00341     }
00342 
00343     return r0 <= r1;
00344 }
